amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 233, the amendment in the nature of a substitue consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 117-3, modified by the amendment printed in part A of House Report 117-12 is considered as adopted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
